alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Pontotoc; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 12:29PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lafayette, northern Pontotoc and southern Union Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pinedale, or 12 miles west of New Albany, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Albany, Pontotoc, Ecru, New Harmony, Etta, Pinedale, Thaxton, Blue Springs, Hortontown, Poolville, Esperanza, Endville, Cherry Creek, Chiwapa, Ellistown, Rough Edge, Nixon, Martintown, Wallerville and Ingomar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
